text:
[Verse]
Sun sets in the sky
Colors start to blend
Stars shining on high
Night will never end

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the dark
Moonlight through the trees
City lights a spark
Dreaming with the breeze

[Chorus]
Twilight dreams
Glowing beams
In between
Night and day

[Verse 3]
Footsteps on the sand
Echoes in the night
Take me by the hand
We'll be alright

[Verse 4]
Shadows fade away
We’re chasing light
Morning won’t betray
Together we take flight

[Chorus]
Twilight dreams
Glowing beams
In between
Night and day
title: Twilight Dreams
